*   üìπ **Screen Recording**: Capture desktop activity and webcam footage directly within the editing environment.

## About Movavi Video Editor
Movavi Video Editor provides a perfect balance of professional features and user-friendly design, making video editing accessible to creators of all skill levels. The software offers comprehensive editing tools in an intuitive interface that reduces the learning curve typically associated with video production. From basic clip trimming to advanced special effects, Movavi delivers robust functionality without overwhelming complexity.

The desktop application is fully optimized for both macOS and Windows platforms, supporting a wide range of video formats and resolutions up to 4K. With hardware acceleration and efficient rendering algorithms, Movavi ensures smooth playback and fast export times. The software serves as an ideal solution for content creators, educators, marketers, and home users looking to produce high-quality videos without extensive technical knowledge.

## ‚öôÔ∏è System Requirements

**For macOS:**
*   macOS 10.12 Sierra or later
*   64-bit processor
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   2 GB of available storage space

**For Windows:**
*   Windows 7/8/10/11 (64-bit)
*   4 GB RAM (8 GB recommended)
*   DirectX 11 compatible graphics card
*   2 GB of available storage space
